metadata.title: AKS Privileged Container Execution
metadata.description: Detects the creation of privileged containers in AKS clusters, which can be used for container escape attacks.

properties.description: Detects when a privileged container is created in an AKS cluster. Privileged containers have full access to the host and can be used for container escape attacks.
properties.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "kube-audit"
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| extend requestObject = parse_json(tostring(parse_json(log_s).requestObject))
| extend responseObject = parse_json(tostring(parse_json(log_s).responseObject))
| extend verb = tostring(parse_json(log_s).verb)
| extend objectRef = parse_json(tostring(parse_json(log_s).objectRef))
| extend user = parse_json(tostring(parse_json(log_s).user))
| where verb in ("create", "update", "patch")
| where objectRef.resource == "pods"
| extend containers = requestObject.spec.containers
| mv-expand container = containers
| extend securityContext = container.securityContext
| where securityContext.privileged == true
| extend
    PodName = tostring(objectRef.name),
    Namespace = tostring(objectRef.namespace),
    ContainerName = tostring(container.name),
    ContainerImage = tostring(container.image),
    Username = tostring(user.username),
    UserGroups = tostring(user.groups),
    ClusterName = Resource
| where Namespace !in ("kube-system", "gatekeeper-system", "azure-arc")
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ClusterName,
    Namespace,
    PodName,
    ContainerName,
    ContainerImage,
    Username,
    UserGroups,
    verb
| summarize
    FirstSeen = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated),
    Count = count()
    by ClusterName, Namespace, PodName, ContainerName, ContainerImage, Username

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: A privileged container '{{ContainerName}}' was created in namespace '{{Namespace}}' by user '{{Username}}'. Privileged containers can escape to the host system.
